Review.Titre: Awful support that lies to get out of…
Review.Contenu: Awful support that lies to get out of doing work and laggy servers

While the server is fine for simple worlds do not try to run anything technical on a melon cube server. MSPT will shoot up with hardly any entities loaded, and even increases for few tile entities. I had to disable spawnchunks to keep MSPT <50 (and TPS at 20), which was annoying and felt cheaty. Also really annoying that no performance tools available in the console. A CPU and RAM monitor would be nice to have, as I had to rely on in-game tools.

Review.Titre: Much better hosts available out there
Review.Contenu: Server was lagging from day 1 but still playable at the time with mods. 2-3 days in, server started lagging worse and would stutter. Lag teleports also happening to my friend and I. Asked for a refund on the 6th day and was denied. Cancelled my recurring charge and moved on. Either host your own server or use someone different. People work hard for their money and this company does not respect that sadly. This has not been my only negative encounter with meloncube. I would suggest either hosting your own server if you current computer can handle that or researching some other companies first to save your money, time and hassle. This is a totally unbiased, non-emotional review I decided to fill out after they emailed it to me a few days after I shut my server down I had for less than a week due to lag. Everyone can learn for themselves but I hope this helps someone out there.

Review.Titre: No obvious way to figure out what…
Review.Contenu: No obvious way to figure out what version of Minecraft is available unless you pay. I needed bedrock edition so I had to cancel and refund afterwards.
you f*c k ing deleted my account, now i cant reach my old server files anymore!!

Review.Contenu: MelonCube didn't have what they said they had, didn't work and then didn't send a refund

Review.Contenu: It wouldn't allow me to sign in for the mods side
Can't access .y server
the server didnt work

Review.Titre: Dont use this host its a joke they…
Review.Contenu: Dont use this host its a joke they spend loads of money on MCM for an ad when they could be spending money on improving there servers.There servers are low grade and do not run properly I would not use this I rather use another host thats alot cheaper and better

Review.Titre: They charge you for modpack updates
Review.Contenu: They charge you for modpack updates. And very vague on how to update on your own pushing you to get their "Advanced Support - Addon" to cover it. Just a 4.99/monthly charge to keep you server updated....
Lag spikes are frequent, doesnt matter how much ram you buy. Wasted money on upgrades. I would recommend Shockbyte, 1.15 runs smooth with just one GB of ram.

Review.Titre: When the hell did I sign up for you…
Review.Contenu: When the hell did I sign up for you guys?
you have bad service I want more servers but you limited me in 2 servers

Hey, I'm FlameHero.Currently the official founder, owner, and director of the MCWarriors Factions Servers.First of all, their servers claim to run on some pretty advanced tech machines, I mean their CPUs are like the best in town, or so as they claim. I haven't noticed any improvements since I switched and in fact I've even had more issues than benefits from switching, low TPS (/timings report said 'Server Performance' and I have 6GB) and a bunch of other issues, boats used to work, now they don't.Second of all, unlike my previous host I was forced to NOT use paperspigot as it was 'crypto mining', I was resetting my server and I HAD to install in a few unstable plugins, yet they couldn't handle it so they first suspended it, then later on terminated it.PS: My server depends on PaperSpigot and some pretty large plugins. I never had issues with the previous host although I was using the SAME version of paper, if you guys don't know the issue don't just go ahead and make theories.Last but not least, one of the most like, I don't even know how to describe it, it's like those staff members you really hate, the ones that claim to know it all when they have no knowledge how to run a server whatsoever.Thanks.EDIT: As a reply to your 'Why my server was terminated', keep in mind that I stated that my server cannot run without Paper, and if I was given less than 36hours I would've completely revamped the server and upgraded, things would've gotten well, but instead you guys rushed into the decision which was unprofessional and the fact that you assumed it was some crypto mining service or something, that...that's just unprofessional okay?

Review.Titre: They’re spamming me everyday to rate
Review.Contenu: They’re spamming me everyday to rate, so i’ll rate.
Inconsistent service

Review.Titre: Worst Minecraft Host customer relations i ever had.
Review.Contenu: Apparently this is a one-man operation and the host lacks any dedicated customer support staff at all, because if he had, maybe they would treated me far better.   First of all i go to post a pre-sales support ticket on their website , a day later, i check the ticket status, it cant be found.  Frustrated, i find that they have live chat on their website, so i open a chat.  I inform them that their is a problem with their ticket system because i posted a ticket the night before, and got email confirmation from them that it was sent,  only to have it missing today.  He pretty much acts like i must have sent it to the wrong site (which i have proof i did not)Then while talking to him about dedicated server options, he closes out the support chat.  (at the same time sending an email to me stating he closed out the new ticket i made because we were chatting, well funny cant talk more if you close the chat eh?)at this point i am pretty upset, so i email them back and say "what the hell? you closed out the chat?"  Turns out he fasley assumes just because i made a few typos and my email has 2005 in it, that means im underage.  First of all i had the same email for 11 years  it was the year i made the email NOT when i was born.it seems to me he and his company is more interested in saving their own behinds then they are about actual customer support.   I also tried to contact the company via facebook hoping, maybe that someone besides HIM managed their facebook page,  Wrong, not only did the chat window show that they were online, it was closed out of (again) and he apparently blocked me on facebook.  Thats ok. i left a negative review, the only review of his service there that hopefully he can not delete.You should hire more support staff. the admin should NOT be the only person who is handling, chat/support, maybe if you had people who knew how to actually do proper PR instead of being overly paranoid to save their own asses.  You might get more customers and therfor able to hire more staff.I never have posted a review here before, but i wanted to personally share my experience , it was appalling. and downright rude.but hey thanks for making my choice so much easierNOT to go with you.[reply to comment below]Sorry but your canned apology does not make up for the horrible way you acted.  actions speak louder then words. the way you acted should have NEVER happend in the first placeif your company was worth its salt. you woudnt have blocked me on facebook either or cowardly removed the review i posted  You turn tail and ran over a misunderstanding rather then deal with it like an adult.Yeah i didnt pay a dime. thats not the point. You woudnt LET me because you falsey assumed i was underage when i am not. and honestly have no reason to prove it to you at this point.  I never had to "prove that" to any other company lately But yes you can save face for yourself here by acting like you are the saint and i was the person being unreasonable anyways the review stands. and at least unlike facebook you cant turn around and disable it.and you call ME the child.and ill post their last email"Can I ask what your aim is here?You haven’t used our services, so we’ve done you no damage. Simply closed your chat window for what we believed was a legitimate reason, and later apologised. Why exactly do you have to go to such great extent to damage our reputation and throw this in our face?Gee here is a thought....maybe if you hadnt acted in the horrible way you did to me in the first place YOU woudnt have damaged your OWN companies reputation.  YOU did that sir. NOT me.you want to talk about being an adult? How about stop blaming others and own up to your own mistakes. thats what being an adult is.  and the mere fact you cant understand that but i can, shows im obviously more adult then you and your company are.also apparently if you post something on youtube they dont agree with they will try to harass you over it too i heard from someone else.my advice to anyone is stay the bloody heck away from this company and spend your hard earned cash elsewhere.yes i didnt pay a dime. so yes maybe i shoudnt be so upset. but its the principal of the matter that is the problem here and THATS what this company fails to understand.
It mostly laggy and not a Good host the only good thing are the prices

The representative who assisted me was very vague, even though I sent him several replies alluding to that fact. I did not fully understand what he was trying to tell me, and he did nothing to provide a full explanation of what I kept asking. His name was Jeremiah J.
You don't get what you pay for, server crashes at least once a day on lower tier packs, even when nothing is happening. It's a noob server host honeytrap, they lure you in with good prices.
very annoying to manage, couldnt change server version either

Review.Titre: my server keeps crashing and lags alot
If You want To Learn Rocket Science Look No Further...
Review.Contenu: If You want To Learn Rocket Science, Then Look no Further then Melon Cube. Giving you No Instructions On How to Setup Your Server, And Taking your Money Since 2013. I Cant Do Crap with this, theres No Video Tutorial, Theres No Guide, I Just Felt Like I wasted My Money.

The staff at Melon Cube, formally known as Endermite Hosting, are not mean but are not the most caring support network you could have. I would NOT recommend them as a preferred hosting provider. Maybe a change in staff would be a better revamp for them.
Their servers hardly ever work, the jars hardly ever work other than the vanilla minecraft, so its basically impossible to host a modded server. I would not recommend the host.
Not very smart support staff, claim to specialize in what they do but don't understand basics of their own service.

Review.Titre: every time i tried to turn off my…
Review.Contenu: every time i tried to turn off my server it would just restart and their was nothing i could do to fix that
The multicraft panel UI is not up-to-date.
Even with 4GB of ram the servers still struggle with only one person online at a time every now and again while on the lower options if two people arent in the same chunks the server will crash

A great and reliable provider, i’ve not much to really complain about. Has easy to use managers and is pretty fairly priced Only problem i have is that my server had some bad lag often, even when theres next to no players, and not a single mod.

Review.Titre: This is super laggy even when we just…
Review.Contenu: This is super laggy even when we just start a new world. However the controls for the server and plugins are probable the best/ user-freindly.
Not that easy to use. Not intuitive. Very easy to delete the whole world by just changing the name of it.

Within less than a week, I’ve had a few server errors where I had to have it down for almost a day due to errors in their GUI. I have also now been blocked from submitting support tickets and have emailed the company about it to recieve not contact back about it and can no longer submit support tickets. My server also has had lag issues to the point where it was behind almost 20000 ms, so about three minutes behind.

Servers have occasional lag spikes on 1.15.2 (24 plugins, Creative server, 5-10 people on, 2GB) with more than enough RAM to handle well. They said my timings reports were average and unfortunately, after upgrading the server, the lag spikes persisted. Overall, the server performance isn't great, but they have a great website/GUI (with occasional outages in specific parts), amazing pricing, and extremely fast support. I'd recommend Meloncube to others who are looking into getting a cheap, non-professional server. I'm hoping that the server lag potentially goes away or is minimized once the whole coronavirus ordeal blows over.

Review.Titre: i want to remove added support from my…
Review.Contenu: i want to remove added support from my account payment is 499 and add more server space but can not find how to change payment plan.

Review.Titre: Decent servers, tech support needs some work
Review.Contenu: Server Performance: 4/5 The server itself runs pretty well.  There have been some hiccups here and there with packet loss however.Tech Support: 2/5There are only 4 techs for nearly 9k servers. Sometimes they respond in under 15 minutes, other times I wait 1-5 hours for a response.  Once, I was waiting for 14 hours to be told a large file transfer was finished and I was the one to have to message them for an update.  Estimated time of completion was 6-8 hours.The majority of the techs can be rather passive aggressive at times.  The only one I haven't seen be that way is Andrew B. They really need to work on their customer service skills and professionalism.  Half of the time they don't answer the questions asked or don't answer them in detail.I understand it can be frustrating to deal with a ton of server owners who may not know what they're doing, but, in the end, they are your customers and there's no easier way to run off customers than to be rude to them or make them feel like a nuisance.p.s. "Disable all plugins and test for the issue" is not a viable option for most server owners that have an active player base.
It's good in over all experience good server and everything you need. But not what I needed.
Low Quality Host, but I guess you can't complain with the cost.

Review.Titre: servers are slow and often take minutes…
Review.Contenu: servers are slow and often take minutes to start up
Simple, easy, worth it. The only complaint I have is the max size of files you can add. You can work around it though given a bit of time.

Jacob was super fast and very friendly, can't complain at allEdit 19/2/23: having an issue with my service, I tried to talk to a rep about it and he was rude, condescending and unprofessionalEdit:25/2/23: Upon talking with someone who apologized for my prior issues with a previous rep, I feel comfortable updating my review, some of the customer service reps leave a lot to be desired but most of them are extremely nice people who go out of their way to help!

Really intuitive user interface. I think that having a log of all the people entering and exiting the server would be helpful to have, though. Also, it is really important to me that I am able to change my name on the portal as seeing my legal name is very upsetting to me. Overall though, very very good.

Review.Titre: Good, but experienced a nasty crash
Review.Contenu: The website says "Many hosts make bold "claims" about uptime, but usually, this is just marketing and promotion. Uptime is something that we're absolutely fanatical and extremely proud about.", so it's a bit ironic that after only a few days of playing on the server, there was a major crash that resulted in ~3 hours of downtime. Plus several more hours of lost progress due to rolling back to an earlier state.But we were compensated for this and other than that, the server has been working fine :)

I have a 6GB server that averages 3-5 players, is fully modded, and has a lot of chunks loaded in. All in all, the lag is (understandably) horrible and it crashes every few hours regardless of how many people are online.I reckon without mods it would run perfectly LMAO. Also, everything is easy to use, I wish there were a bit more tutorials to follow or tips on how to make everything run smoother without buying a larger/new server. Not bad.

The best hosting service I’ve ever used. Fast and effective support replies, no lag even on large amounts of players, and very user friendly control panel. The only thing I disliked was the fact that I had to pay for the second month of service in advance quite early, and in that moment, I didn’t have the required money in my Paypal account, and my server got shut down. Other than that, everything felt perfect

Review.Titre: MelonCube does a great job at creating…
Review.Contenu: MelonCube does a great job at creating servers that work and run well even when strained with over a hundred mods. The only complaint is that the website is not very well organized, so it is hard to access payment plans and change server packages. Great place, but needs to have a website revamp!

Great prices! I ran into some issues with getting my server process auto-killed by the VPS virtualization system a few times, but otherwise my experience was great. I think you may run into this problem with any VPS anyways. If I were to set up a server again I’d still go with MelonCube.

I have been using meloncube for years now and everything goes so smoothly and is really easy to understand. Very affordable aswell for beginner servers. The only issue I personally have is that my server speed seems to drop quite a lot even though I know 10gb of ram (which is the package I have) should handle it smoothly. Would highly recommend this to anyone.

Excellent service, but it's a little bit hard to understand for people not already familiar with server hosting.There's several technicalities in settings pages and such that aren't explained like I'm 5, and thus required a lot of external help to set everything up correctly. That said, it's still better than most other hosting sites I've seen on that front; the FAQ articles didn't solve all my issues but were still useful.

Edit: Company contacted me in the reply below and mentioned some things that made me change my mind. Hosting is alittle pricy but overall the experience was pretty good, and the staff are pretty exceptional. And for the lag, I was running 1.16 and lag can be expected. I was harsh in my earlier review and have reconsidered my words before. At the very least I can say for certainty that you can do much worse in the hosting space. A great hosting company for the beginner.

Review.Titre: A Great Service for Smaller Servers
Review.Contenu: This is a good service. The prices are unbeatable and the support is fast and super helpful. Our server was a touch laggy though. Support was great in helping me optimize our server which fixed a lot of it, but some lag always remained. I would recommend this service for smaller servers.

Review.Titre: Great service so far but only a 4…
Review.Contenu: Great service so far but only a 4 because I had a tough time logging in and finding out what I can and can't do. I also couldn't edit any of the files without first downloading them.
Service it pretty good overall. A little annoying that they upcharge you to enable management features like changing the modpack. A good value overall.
i'm from south east asia and while it's good most of the time, there are lag spikes where i just cant join especially when my US based friends are in. Pretty nice otherwise

Review.Titre: overall a good service aside from 2…
Review.Contenu: overall a good service aside from 2 incidents over a 9 month period there have been no issues and I am content with the service provided.
The Server is really good, but i wish the control panel worked better, it is slightly glitchy sometimes

Review.Titre: Great product but requires additional work
Review.Contenu: Overall it is a great product/service but I do have a few gripes. It is a pain to get plug ins to work at all. I will continue with their services it will just take more work for me to get my servers the way I want.

UPDATED REVIEW AT BOTTOM.Awesome host! Their dedicated server plans are amazing! Cheap, quality specs, good locations, and GREAT customer support! Cannot recommend enough. While I only had their plan for 1-2 months, I had zero issues with them and their support was quick/helpful!Due to unforeseen circumstances I could no longer afford a dedicated server which is why I cancelled. I accidentally cancelled it prematurely though before I could create a backup of files. I contacted host and they said I'd have 1 day to get files I need off of it, or if I wish I could renew my plan too.While I cannot vouch for their shared hosting plans as I have no experience with them, their dedicated servers & support are 10/10! Would use again.----------------------------UPDATED REVIEW:Just a side note, I gave their normal Minecraft plan a try. Perhaps I just had bad timing, but shortly after buying they had maintenance for 15 minutes. Eh, okay fine. Then I try to get back to work on my server and it has daemon connection issues. As far as I can recall, I've only ever had this issue on hosts that use Multicraft. Very annoying, especially because I actually needed this time to work on my server. Literally purchased a $9 plan so I could work on it for  the next few hours and it couldn't even stay up consistently to do that. And daemon issues also mean you can't connect to server files so you can't even create a backup on your PC & do work there instead.TLDR:- Dedicated servers = perfect (5/5)- Support = amazing (5/5)- Minecraft Plans = greatly lacking, at least in my experience over the last ~3 hours. (2/5)

Review.Titre: it is hard to use the modded server but it is a goodd service
Review.Contenu: it is hard to use the modded server but overall i think it is a good service

Review.Titre: Sometimes lagging but usually very good
Very good host but it spend way to much…
Review.Contenu: Very good host but it spend way to much money to get one mod added
Thank you!Small prices. Great support. Good servers. We use it at work.

Review.Titre: My opinion the best value host
Review.Contenu: My opinion the best value host. I had a server with them before and made another one a while ago. Only reviewing now to help others with the host picking process. Before support members were able to log into my server and fix stuff there but now are not allowed to. Also, they said they hold backups for X amount of days, but when I asked for my backup within that time it was nowhere to be found. I was reimbursed with free server time but I lost more expensive builds and all playerdata.This was a little while ago so hopefully things have changed and I'm not too harsh

Review.Titre: The service at MelonCube is really…
Review.Contenu: The service at MelonCube is really great, even with the COVID-19 quarantine. They respond quickly and effectively to any problems I ask them about. They really make you feel valued as a customer.
Good Reliable Cheap
This is a good server host.
more than 10 characters
Really liked itcould use a datapack feature

Review.Titre: Decent Servers for a Decent Price
Review.Contenu: The servers they offer are decent enough, not the best, not the worst. Support has gotten a lot better it seems.  I am not the most organized person and often forget to pay this bill on time as I use it for my test server.  I decided to Add Funds to my account so newly generated invoices would automatically be paid.  (I have done this in the past with no problem.)  This time around my bill was not automatically paid two months in a row, despite it still saying on their site that that's how it works.  Today, I was informed that this is no longer the case and payments need to be posted manually.  Why this is, I have no idea, but it seems silly to remove a helpful feature for both the client and MelonCube.If you want a decent running server with fast support, then go for it, but don't expect miracles.  You won't be able to run a large server with a bunch of plugins here, but it'll get the job done well for smaller servers.
It's a cheap hosting website that gets the job done with relatively no issues

Review.Titre: I just with they had more server locations
Review.Contenu: I just with they had servers available in the US rather than just CA and EU
customer service is excellent, servers are pretty decent aswell
Meloncube responded quickly to do exactly what I needed
Fast, prompt, to the point and exactly the service I need every single time. Everyone at meloncube is awesome sauce!
The support team is amazing they answered really fast and were able to solve any problem I had in a very sort time overall they were awesome.
No better option..First of all, I love the multicraft 2.0 feature. And secondly the performance you get with these servers really cannot be beat.. Best performance I’ve seen in all my findings!

MelonCube is Absolutely Fantastic!!!Quick to set up, quick to answer questions, and the service quality is simply out of this world.  (No pun intended.)  Don't be shy - the tech support gurus at MelonCube have just about all of the answers - and they'll help you through just about any problem except, maybe, willful violations of the laws of physics.  These guys make setting up and running a MineCraft server (of any stripe) an absolute breeze!!!

MelonCube has always handled my service requests respectfully. Their support staff has been very kind and helped me a great deal with any and all issues. This is why I continue to use your service for my Minecraft server hosting needs!
Server didn't lag, never had any issues with their services. I really appreciated the tutorials they had set up to make the server modded. Love these guys

Review.Titre: The most amazing support team ever!
Review.Contenu: The most amazing support team ever!I have never experienced such quick and amazing support team as the team at MelonCube. They were quick and informative with all of their answers, and also managed to intervene and sort things out for me on their end when I couldn't do it myself! Thomas P was amazing, they worked with me for over 5 hours straight to ensure I got what I needed! Worth every penny! I even did a test and messaged other support teams on other sites to compare their response time and they were all over 2hours! longest MelonCube took was 30minutes and that's when they were sorting something out for me. Can not recommend them enough, especially Thomas P :)

My experience with Meloncube has been positive so far. I haven't been here for long, but I was welocmed with open arms (which I truly appreciate). As a partner, nobody has used my link yet, but I am learning to become a youtuber, that way, maybe, I can benefit both sides if I do manage to get an audience.I can't wait to see what I can do as a partner in the future.

Meloncube support has always been super helpful and always replies so quickly when it comes to any concerns I have. I've never had issues with this host from server lag, server management, server uptime, costs, etc. They've made everything really easy to figure out. They're great!

We have been hosting our own little Minecraft server with Melon Cube for more than two years now - we love the admin interface, the plugin installing feature, and just how well everything runs. For casual use with some friends, their "Zombie plan" is great value.

Easy to use website. Can manage your server and plan all very conveniently and without hassle. Support has always been very helpful and nice. I've been using meloncube for a few years now after some bad experiences with other hosting sites, and don't plan on leaving anytime soon!

I have a Meloncube Minecraft server that is super easy to set up and navigate. It ost definitely cheap to buy and 1GB has provided 7 players and me enough room to build and play! I never hear of lag from any of them, and adding plugins is so easy it should be a crime. Definitely recommend this to anyone who doesn't have a lot of money but wants quality.

Review.Titre: I've used meloncube 5 or 6 times now…
Review.Contenu: I've used meloncube 5 or 6 times now for various minecraft servers ranging from the 1GB to 6GB options. They were always working and never had any lag. The support team was always ready to help day or night, and could always get my problem sorted out as quickly as possible. Could not recommend enough.

Review.Titre: Fantastic service, quick, patient, and helpful.
Review.Contenu: We had a world break due player error using some command issues on a modded server. Any of our backups/downloads were more than 2 months old and hundreds of player hours would have been down the drain. Obviously this caused some distress amongst the players. Well we decided to email support to see if anything could be done after exploring some options on our side, and at 2 AM they responded within 20 minutes maybe explaining their automated backups, and even offered to wave this months payment and retroactively provide our backup files for the previous days. They were nothing but helpful, and have consistently been so in the years I've been using the service.

In the past I've used several different hosting services. I always pregen the world and with every other host I got the "server cant keep up" message. When I pre-generated my 1.17 world with meloncube, It was pregening and I never saw my tps drop below 19. My friends and I we're able to play lag free while it was running. After it was done generating, the server run really smooth. I never had this kind of experience with pebblehost, shockbyte, mcprohosting, and bisect hosting. If the server continues to be a good experience then I'll probably be sticking around. The team over at meloncube know what they're doing!

Review.Titre: No reason to choose anything else!
Review.Contenu: I had been using MelonCube's services for about 2 years, then had to stop due to personal reasons.I remember I had some problems (most of them were just me not knowing how to setup things properly), but I created tickets and got an answer in literally 15-20 minutes. I have never seen a faster support anywhere else. My experience was absolutely flawless, and I had nothing bad to say about them.I have recently come back to use their services again, and... It's exactly the same situation! I really am trying to find something bad to say about them since this is a honest review, but I really can't. From the price, to the support, as well as all the features that they offer, its all just unbeatable. I am definitely gonna keep using their services for a very long time.

Meloncube deliver a great service. I haven't noticed downtime or other annoyances these past 2 years :) The interface is nice, It's easy to change settings, especially with the tutorials. If you still don;t manage to make the changes you want, customer service is awesome: very quick, friendly and knowledgable.I definitely recommend!

Review.Titre: MelonCube was able to host a Tekkit…
Review.Contenu: MelonCube was able to host a Tekkit Legends server on 2GB ram mode that lasted my friends and I the whole summer for cheap. The server responded quickly given a good internet connection, and had virtually no downtime. (Look around for coupons for MelonCube servers for discounts though! I got half off 6 mo. )

Review.Titre: Meloncube - The most honest customer review
Review.Contenu: There is surely no other host that will work as hard as the Meloncube support team, from setting you're server up, to just about doing anything. They keep it professional and provide extra support with constant feedback, quick responses, and just overall the greatest host. I've tried so many Minecraft hosting websites, but this one stands out from the rest. The plans are great, promos are amazing, and so is the support. Every dollar counts and they provide so much of their time to make sure the customer receives satisfied help and they make sure the servers are running the way the customer wants it. Thank you for the support so far <3 !!

Review.Titre: THIS SEVER HAS BEEN GREAT THO I HAVE…
Review.Contenu: THIS SEVER HAS BEEN GREAT THO I HAVE HAD A FRIEND THAT HAS BEEN HAVING SMALL TROUBLE STAYING CONNECTED IT HAS BEEN A PLEASURE. SMALL SIDE NOT PLEASE LOOK INTO UNLOADED CHUNKS BEING RESET WHEN TRYING TO ADD PLUGINS OR MODS

Review.Titre: Been with MelonCube for almost a year…
Review.Contenu: Been with MelonCube for almost a year now and they have been extremely helpful if/when I had problems. My server is always running (not a single time where it was down for no reason) and is pretty good about reminding me about updates. If you're looking for a MC sever host, look no further.

Review.Titre: Used this service twice, will return later down the line.
Review.Contenu: Used MelonCraft back in the 1.7.10 days of Direwolf20 modded Minecraft, was really impressed by them back then. I used the Enderman Package both times to host a server with about 3-5 active players. Had no issues with performance or connectivity, We decided to revisit with the 1.12.2 Direwolf20 modded Minecraft Scene for the Covid-19 lockdown period (Using the north-France server as we are all based in the UK with pings of about 25-30 on average), Meloncube didn't dissapoint this time either. Highly recommend, easy to set up and access your server files. Decent pricing too!

MelonCube has been wonderful and has amazingly fair prices. Their customer service is great. They have an easy to use system and it makes it nice for beginner server hosts. MelonCube is great for big servers that can host a lot of players or people that want a safe place to be able to play with their friends.

Not only are the player slots unlimited and servers on the affordable side, but WOW are the Staff members SO quick about responding! The longest I had to wait was 30 minutes! Compared to MCProHosting which took 4 days to get a response.. I'm definitely happy with my new choice of a hosting service and could not be more overwhelmed by the sheer amount of work these Staff members put in to helping anyone and everyone as best they can!

Review.Titre: Smooth, simple, and easy to manage!
Review.Contenu: I was recreating a server that a few friends and I had started until one got salty and became a peen potatoe, so I had the owner copy the entire database for me and I made a meloncube server! Very easy to manage! I just selected the fabric loader we used, drag and dropped the mods we have into the mod folder, and DONE!

Review.Titre: Currently your best choice as of Feb 7, 2022
Review.Contenu: If you're browsing all the different hosting services for a Minecraft 1.18.1+ server, this is very likely to be your best option if you live in North America, Europe, or Asia.They give you complete control over the server folder, configs, server ip address name, everything you could wish for, you are able to change it.If price is the only aspect you're looking for, there are other services with free options and cheaper options, but MelonCube offers the best value in terms of server uptime, no lag, and customizability.After two months of use, I fully recommend using MelonCube for Minecraft server hosting on 1.18.1 and will continue to use their services.

All in all, Meloncube is pretty good. The servers are pretty fast, the panel is easy to use and straightforward. However, even though it is relatively cheap, there is cheaper, and one small complaint I have is that subdomains cost an extra 2$ a month, which I find just slightly unreasonable. One big plus, however, is the support team at Meloncube is one of the best support teams in the entire world. I opened a ticket once, and they responded within 15 Minutes! 15 MINUTES! That is crazy good support, and every time I've submitted a ticket, no matter what time of day, I always get a response within 30 minutes. It's INSANE, and I don't know how they do it, but it is truly amazing.

I've gone through several hosting companies for Minecraft and Web hosting and Meloncube has proved to have the best support, no lag at all, and a safe secure hosted service. Any owners I run into, I always recommend this service to. The staff are not just polite, but offer the best customer service that I've seen from any company. All around, meloncube is the way to go!

Review.Titre: Very cheap for a very good server
Review.Contenu: Very cheap for a very good server! Currently using the 2GB plan (although I plan to switch to a better one soon) and the server runs smooth as butter despite using pretty heavy plugins.There's only been a few major downtimes. One time in 2020 they had an IP change but there was a long enough warning beforehand that we were able to warn the players.My only main gripe is that the client interface is a bit confusing to me but it doesn't really come up as an issue much anyways. The multicraft control panel is easy to learn and use.I've been using this host for about 2 years and I would (and have) recommend it to anyone looking to start a minecraft server!

Review.Titre: Amazing service and super helpful staff!
Review.Contenu: I've used MelonCube for a while, and I absolutely love it! The prices are great for the product. I've had at most 8 people on my server at a time, so I can't speak to its ability to accommodate large numbers. However, even with all 8 people on and the cheapest plan, I never ran into any problems. Recently I ran into an issue in trying to install a modpack. I opened a support ticket, and the staff had it installed and ready to play within an hour and a half of opening the ticket! All around incredible service and helpful staff. I would definitely recommend MelonCube to anyone looking for a Minecraft server!

The service is quick and helpful. The helpers are not cynical and truly try to help you. For example, I had made a mistake on my server and needed to go back one day with automatic back-ups, but by the time I got the back-up service, it was the next day and I now needed two-day back-ups. As I had originally requested when only one-day back-ups were needed, they gave me access to the back-up I needed for free.Everything works as marketed. I had a 1 GB server with no add-ons for a year (now I have one add-on) and it has run well, despite using countless command blocks and even some repeating command blocks.

Review.Titre: I've been using Meloncube for over two…
Review.Contenu: I've been using Meloncube for over two years now and I've never had one instance of a problem, loss of data, downtime, etc. Very very satisfied with what I'm paying for! I've also received excellent help when I need it.

Review.Titre: Amazing host at half the cost of the competition
Review.Contenu: MelonCube has been wonderful in every way for me. I was having issues with my previous server hosts performance and reliability so I was looking for a replacement and MelonCube came through with an amazing response to my inquiries I made about switching to them. I was offered a server setup that came with the same amount of ram as my previous host for half the price I was paying. They also set everything up that I wanted on the server immediately. 10/10

Excellent customer service! I've been using MelonCube for my web hosting & game hosting needs for the last 5 years and have never been disappointed by them. Highly recommended for anyone starting out with any type of server as their services are very easy to use and the support team will help with any issue you run into!

I wrote a ticket, got up to get food for like 5/10 minutes, meloncube answers me with a full working solution. They have amazing hardware, perfect uptime and AMAZING staff and stupidly good prices. HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT

I have had a Minecraft server with them on and off since around 2020, the customer service have been amazing and their services are awesome :)Specifically responding to support tickets have been perfect which is paramount to a good hosting service11/10 would recommend for small communities

Review.Titre: Cheap, easy, and great customer support.
Review.Contenu: At first, I was a bit skeptical on how good meloncube was, as the servers were really cheap, but I'm amazed at how quick and helpful there customer support is, and how user friendly the UI is on their control panel. 5/5!

Review.Titre: The Best Place to Server Host
Review.Contenu: The best place to server host. Ive never had a bad encounter with them, theyre always friendly, and understanding when i have an issue that i need fixed. Very accomodating and kind, ill never be switching to a different service

Great prices, extremely responsive customer service, and an intuitive user interface to manage plugins, backups, and upgrades. I switched from a provider that was pricier and with more lag, so it’s safe to say I was thrilled with the choice of MelonCube. You really can’t go wrong with MelonCube for Minecraft server hosting!

I compared a lot of similar Minecraft hosts, but Meloncube's pricing and features seemed the best and I'm glad I went with them. Unlimited player slots, unlimited storage (with very reasonable exceptions), and the ability to run whatever plugins you want are features usually reserved for expensive tiers, but Meloncube offers them at their cheapest levels.Our server's performance and reliability has impressed me so far, and when I needed to make a change to my plan, their support was fast, friendly, and helpful.

I have used meloncube hosting for about half a year now and i have had an amazing experience with their panel and support, no lag or bad tps even if i was using 1gb ram on 1.16.4 it ran perfectly smooth + their offer is 2.55 euro/month for 1gb.

Have used their service for the past 2 years on and off. Me and my friends were trying to get into minecraft modded and realized it was not gonna work, if someone had to host the server it meant that no 24/7 uptime, which was sort of inconvenient for us as we had different sleep schedules, as such we turnt to external hosting. By chance we ran into Meloncube, which is by far one of the best quality/price ratios we've seen for server hosting. As we've tried other hosts as well, none come close to meloncube's customer service, instant response, actually helps you out, definitely recommend meloncube to anyone!

My husband and I have bought 5 servers for our grandchildren, and they have had many pleasant hours playing on them with their friends and even with us. Also, our grandson is getting into programming, and having the servers available is a great motivation for him to create programs for others. Support has been excellent, the servers are always up, and they perform well.

Exceptional service in the times I’ve needed help! Great hosting, inexpensive for the great service provided! Only had a minor issue once and the techs helped right away!! No complaints and would recommend to others!
MelonCube hosted a small server of mine for two years for a small group of friends. Very easy to set up and manage, uptime was high and service was quick to respond to issues. Would recommend!

Melon Cube is awesome! The service is great with all plugins available and I only have to connect from the vanilla Minecraft to enter a spigot server with any plugins I want. A Melon Cube server is very cheap and super easy to host. Melon Cube is the perfect place for a cheap and easy server. 10/10!

I have been using MelonCube Hosting for around two years now. They are very cheap with prices, and provide you with quality hosting. The customer server is amazing, and MelonCube is very professional. Would totally recommend to anyone making a Minecraft Server!
No problems, good tools, decent UI.Good service for beginners and pros alike.Dark mode in the server interface tips this one into 5 stars.

Never had any issues using Meloncube's services.  Reliable and easy to use, and great support.  Haven't experienced any downtime.  Upgrading/changing packages is easy.  Been hosting for about a year now.
They've helped me quickly and efficiently. Always had an answer for any question I had. Their service is the best I've found so far, as well as being insanely reasonably priced.

6 Months ago, I forgot to back up my minecraft world and it got terminated. I lost everything, the time with my friends, our buildings, loot everything! MelonCube comes clutch with the backup and everything was restored. Their customer support is the best out there. Service 10/10Support 10/10Servers 10/10
Great prices on hosting. Support is always very fast and super helpful. Have continued to use them on and off for years.

This server hosting is amazing. Everything about it is absolutely great. Everything from the performance to the accessibility is amazing. The only problem I had is not automatically being able to apply plug-ins but other than that multi craft is very affordable and has great performance.
Amazing customer service that has helped me with ease more than twice. The staff is very polite and patient with you.The customer service alone is why I would recommend these servers to someone.

Review.Titre: Meloncube is a fantastic server host!
Review.Contenu: Meloncube is a fantastic server host. I have been using them for a long time now and love their services and pricing. They have knowledgeable and great customer service as well!

I've used their services for almost a month now, and I plan to buy their year long server. I've had no issues other than the fact that I wish I could simply extend my plan from one month to a year seamlessly.. unless there is a way, and I'm not seeing it.

Review.Titre: Good service with useful manager tools.
Review.Contenu: I have using this service for holding a Minecraft server for a month. The sever has a good connection and good manager tools for server managing. So I want to keep relationships with this service :)

My experience with meloncube has been incredibly pleasant. My brother bought a server for our discord server to play in, with a modpack made by me, and we've run into almost no issues. We originally bought the 1 year plan for a 1GB RAM server, since it was cheapest and we thought it'd be enough. After officially opening the server, a few people joined for the stress test, and there was a bit of lag, which we thought "fair enough, we just need to upgrade". It was our fault, and we knew that. We ended up upgrading to the 4GB subscription, and there has been practically no lag anymore! I really enjoy the quality of the servers. There is virtually no lag at all when playing, even when running several automatic farms at once on different dimensions! Even modded dimensions, in fact! The prices are incredibly fair, maybe even a little cheap at times, and the quality is incredible considering how many customization options you get, especially with automatic modpack installation! Overall, a 10/10 experience, and will keep using this service in the future.

Review.Titre: very good server hosting very cheap and…
Review.Contenu: very good server hosting very cheap and the support is the nicest poeple alive i could not imagine any better hosting for that price Thank you

i have been using Meloncube as a server hosting service for my Minecraft server and i am very happy with my choice. they have excellent service with very fast response time when you need help with anything, they have very low prices compared to other server hosting services I've seen. overall i would recommend Meloncube to anyone needing affordable server hosting.

*English is not my native language, so it may be spelling errors in this review, please bear with it. :)My experience with MelonCube I got to say it's been really good overall.My first server (1Gb) lasted 5 months, and I did not have any issue at all using a bunch of plugins. As today, my second one (3Gb) have been running for a couple weeks with even more plugins and everything runs smoothly.Now about the features, the Multicraft 2.0 control panel may look threatening at first, but once you get to know it, it is really easy to use, and gives you the chance to customize almost every aspect of your server: whether you want to just play vanilla or make a Spigot/Paper/Bukkit server with a lot of plugins. If you do not know how to do something, MelonCube does have video tutorials  and a "Knowledge" section in the website for basic and advanced stuff, and I guess you can also contact with support by making a ticket if you want.I'm really happy with my experiencie so far, plus they are not as expensive as other "famous" hosting services that does not even offer the amount of extras and specs that MelonCube does.Just make sure you select the proper region for your server, and everything will run smoothly.

I used MelonCube to host my server for about a year and a half. Having switched from MCProHosting, MelonCube was a much more reasonable alternative, and I'm very glad I made the switch. Overall, my server had way less lag, the customer support was quick to respond and very helpful, and everything ran smoother server-side once I switched to MelonCube. For reference, I ran a Paper server with around 65 plugins and 8GB of RAM, and there was only lag and TPS drops during popular events (when 20-60 people were on the server at once) - while I did try to circumvent this by buying extra RAM during events, that didn't help much. In terms of Minecraft server hosts, I know there are certainly less expensive options out there, but MelonCube is definitely worth the price for its quality and its support.
Jeremiah J and Alex C were both helpful and helped me get my server to where it needed to be for my unique situation.

Review.Titre: Very good for playing with a few friends
Review.Contenu: Works very well for the price (I got the cheapest option) and runs smoothly. I’ve only had 5 people on it at the same time before, so I cannot review higher than that

Review.Titre: I had an amazing experience with meloncuve
Review.Contenu: Every time I need support they were super timely and helpful. They were very profession and knowledgeable. Pricing was great considering the support they provided
Constant uptime for my service, support is quick to help with any issues you have. I have recommended this service many times and will continue to do so.

AMAZING SERVER HOST! Staff is kind with fast responces on tickets and its a simple website to use and its amazing and cheap! Love the deals when you buy quarterly, half anually and anually, helps a ton!
Meloncube have always been fantastic. They are tireless in resolution when you have inevitable issues, and the service is always great. I also think the server hosting is of good value.
I've used MelonCube for MC Server hosting a couple different times now, and I love their service. So quick and easy to set up, and such a good price.
I've had servers hosted by 5 different hosts in the last 5 years and MelonCube is by far the best in cost, support, simplicity and uptime.Can definitely recommend.

Review.Titre: Melon cube offered some of the best…
Review.Contenu: Melon cube offered some of the best customer support I've ever seen on a server host and had blazing fast servers!
Excellent provider.Quick and straight forward support.Easy to use customer portal for changing settings, adding plugins etc.

Review.Titre: 2 GB on a paperMC 1.15 server and yet very little lag
Review.Contenu: It is amazing how little lag there is with 2 GB on my server (recently upgraded to 3) I find it amazing how good their customer support is, with getting a response in hours at max.
I highly recommend meloncube. It has very affordable servers but that doesn’t stop it from being fast
This team is the best! Always have fast and excellent service, I highly recommend using them to host your Minecraft server.
Nothing ever went wrong, your youtube channel was actually helpful,very good service, easy use web portal.
Support team is amazing. Fixed all my issues withing 15  mins to an hour of my request.Sever runs great, site is easy to use and operate for a new user

Review.Titre: This server saved my friend group
Review.Contenu: For only 30$ a year I can play Minecraft with all my friends and it runs great. It brought my friend group back together! Thank you so much Meloncube!
If you want a server meloncube is the website to use, you can get it for a cheap price and control your server the way you want.
Quick and respectful customer service, and extensive how to videos.  Well worth the money for the service provided.  Thank you!
They have awesome customer support and honestly grest server speeds, and theirstuff starts at $3 a month. It's great
Very good server hosting never lags and very reliable I got the 3 gigabyte package and it was still not laggy at all
Staff are very quick at responding to any issues. Prices are reasonable and I've never had any server performance issues.
Everything is working well for the Minecraft server no issues and easy to set up
Support is incredible and the services are super reliable and easy to use with FTB. Never had a problem with them.

MelonCube hosting has been great value for the price, with: easy payment processing; prompt and accurate technical support and guides; Minimal disruption of services; and a intuitive server control panel. I have been a customer for more than 3 years now, hosting a Minecraft server and personal web server for my blogs and wikis. I recommend MelonCube hosting to everyone I know.

Review.Titre: Was recommended this service by a… friend
Review.Contenu: Was recommended this service by a friend, I would be willing to use it again. Never once had a problem with this service. Hope this helps! <3

Review.Titre: Me and my friends love this server
Review.Contenu: Me and my friends love this server. We play on it every night, you can play with the server commands and you have lots of control over your server. Overall I rate this 5 stars not laggy at all

Review.Titre: Quick replies and clear explanations of…
Review.Contenu: Quick replies and clear explanations of the situation and its remedies. Extremely active and caring host.

MelonCube Hosting is a really good choice and SOLID choice in my opinion. They are one of the two hosting companies I love. (My other primary choice is Aquatis but you can check my review for them on my profile). Anyways... I used them for many months on my past servers about 2 years ago. Tickets are answered in a reasonably good amount of time and they are pretty helpful. They'll do whatchu need and are professional about it. Their prices start at 3$ per GB which is pretty good, not the cheapest one but still better than a lot of other host that charge 7$, 8$, or even 9$ per GB. Quality host, reasonable prices, and good/helpful support. Over many months of using their service I never really had a problem with my servers. They ran smoothly without lag or connection issues. One thing I REALLY LOVED was that they can retrieve your old server files even after 12 months. Sounds scary but they keep everything private and secure. Your data is encrypted and protected (at least I'm 99% sure it is). Moreover, I remember shutting down my server for like a year and I came back asking if they still had it and to my surprise they did. They setup my server right where I left off 12 months after I initially shut down my server. I have not used them in like 2 years since I shut down my server but you're essentially paying for great servers and support without spending too much money. You really get the bang for your buck. So yea, MelonCube is a solid choice.

Review.Titre: Always finding the problems and fixing…
Review.Contenu: Always finding the problems and fixing them even if it wasn't a problem with the hosting but the mods

Review.Titre: Reliable, good service, worth the price
Review.Contenu: Generally speaking the service is easy to navigate, the response time to the problems I have had (largely of my own making) has been quick and superb.

Review.Titre: So far I have had no problems and my…
Review.Contenu: So far I have had no problems and my gaming experience has been nice and flawless.

Review.Titre: My go-to pick for server hosting
Review.Contenu: Support was very available and kind. Services fairly priced. Server worked perfectly.

I'll start off by saying that MelonCube is a cheap hosting and they provide excellent customer service including dedicated servers for example im a customer with MelonCube and my server has 20-19 TPS Constantly and if i run into any issues i'll open a ticket and they will reply withing 5-15 minuets which is excellent so they can review what the problem is and fix it! Also not only there prices and Customer Service are excellent but there Service team is also very respectful and nice to speak with not once did i ever have a argument with them! Glad to be a Customer by MelonCube
Everything worked perfectly, easy to set up, easy to connect to the server, and super fast response on a ticket I put in to update the server to the very recently released version of Pixelmon.

I am pleasantly surprised... no pleasantly taken back in shock!  We live in a time where customer support is in the hands of the corporate automation system.  Customer support is most always pretty miserable for the customer.  NOT this company .. no.  I made the change over to this company just due to the list of features and quality this company seemed to have for competitive but a wee bit lower than most competition due to hard times.  typically, when I change hosting services it is just trading one bad experience for another.  The first day I had to contact customer support for something due to an outage somewhere in their area.  They were totally on it... never quit, responded PERSONALLY right away within a very short period.  2 more tickets were placed over time due to things beyond their control... they stuck with it for hours back and forth with me till it was resolved... without question.  Just to show you how far this last call went, the customer support agent (Josh) was helping me with resource pack download that wasn't working, so he told me to try another place to hold / host my resource pack.  it didn't work.. turns out the site was having issues.. Josh didn't just write it off to move on to another customer, he stuck with it, found another one for me, and didn't stop there, he actually uploaded the resource pack I was using to it himself to test it out and responded with the links to the site and the codes to use.  he didn't have to do that.  he didn't have to do any of it according to today's standards.  Every call has been like that with Josh.  3 times, he has taken customer service to elite perfection yet still helped me to be independent with information.  I love this company because of Josh. I know they have other customer service folks but I just haven't gotten them yet.
The service is really good, and the support is really helpful. I would like to work with you again if I need another server
